Description:
Apartament acollidor, nestled in the picturesque town of Arinsal, offers guests a serene retreat with stunning mountain views. This charming apartment is just 6 km away from the vibrant Arinsal (Ski Station Pal-Arinsal), making it an ideal base for skiing enthusiasts and nature lovers alike. With free WiFi and private parking on-site, guests can enjoy the convenience and connectivity during their stay.

Each unit in Apartament acollidor boasts tiled floors and is equipped with a kitchenette that includes a microwave, dining area, flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom complete with a shower and hairdryer. Additional amenities like a fridge, oven, toaster, kettle, and coffee machine ensure guests have everything they need to feel at home.

The apartment features a terrace, providing a perfect spot for guests to relax and soak in the breathtaking surroundings. For those eager to hit the slopes, skiing opportunities are abundant in the proximity of the apartment, offering an adventure right at your doorstep.

Guests are kindly requested to inform Apartament acollidor of their expected arrival time in advance, using the Special Requests box when booking or by contacting the property directly with the details provided in the confirmation. It's important to note that the property does not accommodate hen, stag, or similar parties, ensuring a peaceful and respectful environment for all guests.

A damage deposit of EUR 150 is required upon arrival, to be collected as a cash payment. This deposit is a safeguard against any potential damages and is fully refundable upon check-out, subject to an inspection of the property to ensure everything is in order.

Managed by a private host, Apartament acollidor promises a personalized and comfortable stay, blending the beauty of its mountainous surroundings with the warmth of a cozy home. Whether you're here to explore the great outdoors or simply to unwind in a tranquil setting, this apartment offers a perfect escape in the heart of Arinsal.

Description: CasaSur Palermo Hotel, nestled in the vibrant Buenos Aires district of Palermo, offers a luxurious stay within close proximity to some of the city's most enchanting attractions. This 4-star hotel is strategically located, allowing guests easy access to Distrito Arcos and the serene Carlos Thays Botanic Garden, with both being just a short 5-minute drive away. Additionally, the hotel is conveniently situated 1.1 miles (1.8 km) from the lively Serrano Square and 1.4 miles (2.2 km) from the expansive greenery of Bosques de Palermo. The hotel boasts 61 elegantly furnished guestrooms, each equipped with refrigerators and minibars for your convenience. Rooms feature private balconies, offering guests their own personal space to relax and take in the vibrant city or serene hotel surroundings. Entertainment is readily available with flat-screen televisions that come with cable programming, complemented by complimentary wireless Internet access to keep guests connected. The private bathrooms are well-appointed with complimentary toiletries and hair dryers, ensuring a comfortable stay. Dining at CasaSur Palermo Hotel is an experience in itself, with the hotelâ€™s restaurant, Sacro, serving a variety of delightful dishes. Guests also have the option to enjoy their meals in the comfort of their rooms, thanks to the hotel's room service available during limited hours. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM, ensuring a perfect start to the day with a range of delicious options. Guests should note the check-in instructions, including the potential for extra-person charges and the requirement for government-issued photo identification and a credit card for incidental charges at check-in. Special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. The hotel prioritizes convenience and security, accepting credit cards and not cash. For those planning to arrive after 8:00 PM, it is advisable to contact the property in advance using the information provided in the booking confirmation. The front desk staff will warmly greet guests upon arrival, ensuring a smooth and welcoming check-in process. CasaSur Palermo Hotel stands as an emblem of luxury and convenience in Buenos Aires, offering an unparalleled stay in Palermo with its strategic location, exquisite rooms, and exceptional dining experiences. Whether you're in Buenos Aires for leisure or business, CasaSur Palermo Hotel promises a memorable and comfortable stay in the heart of one of the city's most dynamic neighborhoods.

Description:
Set in a charming adobe house surrounded by a garden, Rincon del Valle offers rooms with rustic decor and free Wi-Fi 2.5 km from Jujuy city centre. Breakfast is provided and common kitchen facilities are featured.

With stylish furnishing and exposed stone walls, rooms at Rincon del Valle are bright and spacious. They feature ceiling fans and private bathrooms.

A continental breakfast is served daily. Guests can prepare their own meals in the common kitchen.

There is a charming organic garden where guests can unwind on returning from an excursion. They can also relax in the lobby, by the fireplace.

Free parking is provided. Rincon del Valle is 700 metres from National Road 9 and 100 metres from Provincial Road 2.

Description:
Featuring an indoor and an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub, Altos del Sol - Spa & Resort offers stylish rooms and bungalows overlooking the Conlara Valley.  The property boasts a spa and wellness centre, and breakfast is provided. Merlo city centre is 1.5 km away.

Decorated with exposed brick walls, rooms and bungalows at Altos del Sol - Spa & Resort feature cable TV and air conditioning. All rooms feature views of the mountains and a complete bathroom, some with a bath tub.

Guests at Altos del Sol - Spa & Resort can enjoy drinks and snacks from the bar in the garden, which boast a wide diversity of local tree species. A terrace and a childrens playground are also available. Meeting facilities can be used for a surcharge. The games room features table tennis. Room service is provided.

Services offered by the hotel include concierge services, a tour desk, luggage storage and currency exchange. Free parking is available on site.

Altos del Sol - Spa & Resort is 900 metres from the Casino and 400 metres from Avenida del Sol. San Luis Airport is 200 km away. Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.

Description:
Featuring a swimming pool, a spa and a fitness centre, Hipocampus Resort & Spa offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV in Carlos Paz. Breakfast is provided. The city centre is 1 km away.

With private balconies overlooking the hills, rooms at Hipocampus are fitted with chic decor. All of them feature heating and private bathrooms with toiletries.

Breakfast is served daily. Spa facilities include a sauna and a fitness centre.

Free parking is provided, subject to availability. Hipocampus Resort & Spa is 45 km from Pajas Blancas Airport in Cordoba city. Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.

Description:
Boasting garden views, Casa Pichi Ruca offers accommodation with a garden and a patio, around 44 km from Paso Cardenal Samore. Set 9 km from Los Arrayanes National Park, the property features barbecue facilities and free WiFi.

The chalet has 5 bedrooms, a TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Cerro Bayo is 12 km from the chalet. The nearest airport is San Carlos De Bariloche Airport, 59 km from Casa Pichi Ruca.

Description:
Offering luxurious apartments with a bath and a fully equipped kitchen, Emerald Inn is just 5 minutes drive from shops and restaurants in Emeralds town centre. All apartments include free WiFi and free covered parking.

Located on the ground floor, each air-conditioned apartment features stylish dcor and stainless steel appliances. All apartments offer a lounge area with a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a DVD player.

Emerald Inn Apartments are 10 minutes drive from Emerald Airport. The Sapphire gem fields are 45 minutes drive away. Guests have access to a communal BBQ area perfect for a shared outdoor meal. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note that there is a 3% charge when you pay with an American Express or Diners Club credit card.

Description:
Annie Roes is one of the few B&Bs set high on the Dandenong Ranges with views of the city lights/skyline from both the Penthouse Apartment and City View Cottage.

We also have our small Garden Cottage which has its own decking area and boasts great value. Set amongst lovely gardens, Annie Roes Luxury B&B offers free Wi-Fi in all areas and free in room breakfast. All accommodation features a patio or a balcony with garden views. Some rooms have a fireplace or a spa bath.

Annie Roes Bed and Breakfast is a 10-minute walk from Golden Ray Liliums and a 15-minute walk from the National Rhododendron Gardens. Monbulk Winery is a 15-minute drive away and Melbourne is a 1-hour drive.

All air-conditioned accommodation features a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. It offers a BBQ, microwave, fridge and a toaster. Some rooms have a fully equipped kitchen. The en-suite bathroom has fluffy bathrobes and free toiletries. Please note that Annie Roes Luxury B&B does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Please note the WiFi signal is sometimes weak in the mountain area.
HotelFacilities: Free self parking Garden Non-smoking rooms Breakfast service Internet access BBQ facilities Heating Luggage storage Free WiFi Free WiFi Air conditioning

Description:

The holiday home has 1 bedroom, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go fishing and canoeing nearby.

Description:
Located opposite Rosebud Bay Beach on Port Philip Bay, The Admiral Motor Inn offers accommodation with free WiFi. Facilities include a guest laundry, a BBQ area and free onsite parking.

We have 5 ground floor studio rooms and 5 upstairs / balcony rooms. Please advise your choice, (subject to availability).

Each air conditioned motel suite and apartment at Admiral Motel features a work desk, a flat-screen TV and a mini refrigerator.

All rooms have an outdoor table and chairs. Apartments with a fully equipped kitchen and a spa bath are available.

Admiral Motor Inn Rosebud is situated on the southern end of the Mornington Peninsula, with shops and restaurants on the doorstep. Rye is a 5-minute drive away, Blairgowrie is 10 minutes and Sorrento is 20 minutes. Please inform Admiral Motor Inn in advance of your expected arrival time. Description: Located just a stone's throw from the iconic Bondi Beach, this apartment serves as a paradise for outdoor enthusiasts and culture seekers alike, nestled in the vibrant heart of Sydney's Bondi Beach area. It offers access to a wide range of activities suited to various preferences, whether you're an adrenaline junkie or a history buff. For those into trail running and hiking, the scenic coastal trails start just minutes away. The Bondi to Coogee coastal walk, a cliffside trail offering breathtaking views of the ocean, is perfect for both trail running and leisurely hikes, challenging the avid runner with its varying elevations while also delighting hikers with stunning vistas and occasional whale sightings. Bondi Beach, a mere 2-minute drive away, epitomizes Sydney's beach culture, allowing you to indulge in everything from sunbathing and swimming to more adventurous pursuits like surfing and paddleboarding. The beach also hosts a vibrant array of beachfront cafes and bars, perfect for unwinding after a day in the sun. For those interested in the cultural tapestry of the area, the apartment's proximity to several historical landmarks allows for easy exploration of the historic Rocks district, where Sydney's European history began. Wander through cobblestone streets, visit Australia's oldest pub, or take a guided tour to learn about the convicts and settlers who shaped Sydney. Staying in this apartment not only offers a comfortable and convenient place to rest but also immerses you in the vibrant lifestyle and rich history of Sydney's Bondi Beach area, promising an unforgettable experience whether you're drawn to the adrenaline of water sports, the tranquility of coastal walks, or the allure of historical exploration.

Description:
Maison Des Jardins B & B, situated in the vibrant Gay Village of Montreal, presents a cozy and welcoming environment, just a mere 7 minutes' walk from Beaudry Metro Station. This bed and breakfast features air-conditioned rooms, ensuring comfort regardless of the season.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV for entertainment, and select rooms boast a seating area, offering a cozy nook to unwind after an eventful day. Guests are invited to indulge in the serene ambiance of the garden-terrace or relax in the outdoor hot tub, providing a perfect blend of relaxation opportunities right at their doorstep.

Accommodations come with the choice of private or shared bathrooms, catering to different preferences and budgets. The shared kitchen facility underscores a sense of community and convenience, allowing guests to prepare meals and interact with fellow travelers.

Located close to the heart of Montreal's action, Maison Des Jardins B & B is merely 900 meters away from the Latin Quarter and the University of Quebec in Montreal (UQAM), making it an ideal spot for guests eager to explore the cultural and academic vibrancy of the city. Pierre Elliott Trudeau Airport is 17 km away, facilitating easy access for international and domestic travelers.

Guests planning their visit are encouraged to inform Maison Des Jardins B & B of their expected arrival time in advance, using the Special Requests box when booking or by contacting the property directly. This ensures a smooth and personalized check-in experience.

Maison Des Jardins B & B stands as a testament to Montreal's inclusive and diverse spirit, offering a comfortable and convenient stay for all who walk through its doors. Whether you're in town for leisure, academic purposes, or to soak in the cultural richness of Montreal, this bed and breakfast offers a charming retreat amidst the city's bustling life.

Description:
Located in the heart of Newmarket, Comfort Inn Newmarket places guests within easy reach of exciting activities and significant attractions, including a 5-minute drive to In Play Inc. and the tranquil Rogers Reservoir Conservation Area. This eco-certified hotel is conveniently situated, offering quick access to the Elman W. Campbell Museum and Magna Centre, both within 2.7 miles, perfect for those interested in exploring local history and culture.

The hotel features 100 guestrooms equipped with modern amenities such as refrigerators and LCD televisions, ensuring a comfortable stay. With Select Comfort beds adorned with premium bedding, complimentary wireless Internet, and private bathrooms stocked with complimentary toiletries and hair dryers, guests are guaranteed both comfort and convenience.

For those seeking outdoor adventure, the area around Comfort Inn Newmarket is rich with opportunities for trail running and mountain biking, with trails that cater to all skill levels. Golf enthusiasts can enjoy several picturesque courses nearby, offering a perfect way to unwind and challenge themselves. Hiking lovers will find the Rogers Reservoir Conservation Area and surrounding natural landscapes ideal for exploring the beauty of Newmarket's outdoors.

The hotel serves a complimentary buffet breakfast daily, providing a strong start to a day filled with activities. Safety features such as carbon monoxide and smoke detectors ensure a worry-free stay, while the property's policy of accepting credit cards adds convenience.

With its strategic location, Comfort Inn Newmarket not only offers a comfortable lodging option but also acts as a gateway to the diverse activities and attractions in the area, from historical sites to family entertainment options like In Play Inc., ensuring a memorable stay for all types of travelers.

Description:
La Sastreria Hotel Boutique, located in the picturesque Providencia neighborhood of Santiago, is perfectly positioned for guests to immerse themselves in the city's vibrant culture and natural beauty. Within just a 10-minute walk, guests can explore the Sculpture Park and marvel at the architectural wonder of Gran Torre Santiago. This ski hotel is also conveniently close to the Costanera Center and Santiago Metropolitan Park, making it an ideal base for both shopping enthusiasts and nature lovers.

The hotel offers an intimate setting with just 5 guestrooms, each featuring flat-screen televisions and complimentary wireless Internet access to ensure guests stay connected and entertained. The partially open bathrooms are equipped with showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers, providing a comfortable and convenient stay. Added amenities like portable fans and daily housekeeping further enhance the guest experience.

Dining at La Sastreria Hotel Boutique is a delight, with a coffee shop/cafe on-site serving a variety of tempting options. Guests can also enjoy a complimentary buffet breakfast served daily from 8 AM to 11 AM, perfect for fueling up before a day of exploration.

For those looking to enjoy the great outdoors, the hotel's proximity to Santiago Cable Car: Oasis Station opens up a world of adventure. Guests can easily access skiing opportunities, making it a haven for winter sports enthusiasts. The area is also ideal for hiking, offering trails that provide stunning views of the city and its surrounding natural landscapes. Additionally, guests interested in trail running, mountain biking, and exploring historical sites will find the hotel's location advantageous.

La Sastreria Hotel Boutique provides a range of services to ensure a seamless stay, including transfers from the cruise terminal and airport (surcharges may apply). For those arriving after 7 PM, it is recommended to contact the property in advance to arrange check-in. The hotel's commitment to safety is evident in its inclusion of fire extinguishers and first aid kits, ensuring peace of mind for all guests.

This boutique hotel's unique blend of cozy accommodations, strategic location near Santiago Cable Car: Oasis Station, and access to outdoor activities makes it a perfect choice for travelers seeking an authentic Santiago experience. Whether you're in the city for skiing, shopping, or simply to soak in the local culture, La Sastreria Hotel Boutique offers a charming and convenient base for your adventures.

At the economy hotel, every room includes a wardrobe and a TV. With a private bathroom, some rooms at La Fragata Src also feature pool view.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an american breakfast.

Pereira is 11 km from La Fragata Src, while Manizales is 26 km from the property. Matecaa International Airport is 15 km away. Please inform La Fragata Src in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Situated in Drake, 1.5 km from Colorada, Hotel Finca Maresia features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 2.9 km of Cocalito Beach. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service.

At the hotel, the rooms have a balcony. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are fitted with a patio and others also boast garden views. At Hotel Finca Maresia rooms have bed linen and towels.

A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property.

The nearest airport is Drake Bay Airport, 10 km from the accommodation. Please inform Hotel Finca Maresia in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Just 40 metres from Jaco Beach, Hotel Los Ranchos features an outdoor swimming pool and is surrounded by beautiful rainforest. This family-run Costa Rican property offers rooms, apartments and bungalows.

All accommodation at Hotel Los Ranchos has traditional dcor with dark wooden furnishings. There is air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom.

Apartments and bungalows also feature a kitchen. Shops and restaurants can be found within 100 metres of Los Ranchos.

The property can arrange surf board rental and classes, as well as trips to Manuel Antonio Nature Reserve. You can observe wildlife and exotic plants in the grounds surroudning the hotel.

San Jos and Juan Santa Mara Airport can be reached in 90 minutes by car.

Address: 200m NW Of Amor De Mar Hotel Suspension Bridge On The RightMontezuma 60111Puntarenas
Description:
Located in Montezuma,  Sunshine Sanctuary provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge and a garden.

A  la carte breakfast is available daily at the lodge.

At  Sunshine Sanctuary guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub.

A terrace is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the accommodation.

Montezuma Beach is 500 metres from  Sunshine Sanctuary, while Montezuma Waterfal is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Tambor, 12 km from the lodge, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Sunshine Sanctuary is more than a hotel. This quiet treasure is nestled in the heart of the jungle. Each room offers a private entrance, private balcony, AC, hot water and cable TV. Included in your stay is a full breakfast, a private hanging bridge, cafe, bar, Fiber optic WIFI, a fully stocked kitchen available to guests, laundry services and a yoga shala. This sanctuary is located as close to the Montezuma waterfalls as one can stay, a leisurely 10-minute walk, which is reached by a private path. Along the way you will likely encounter howler and white-faced monkeys, toucans, and a rainbow of other birds, pizotes, a myriad of butterflies and the wonder of local flora. We are located about 400 meters from the beach. The main road from the beach is steep. Gravel steps and stairs are a part of the journey. Please inform Sunshine Sanctuary Boutique Jungle Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Apartments Josip has sea views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Ciici, 60 metres from Ciici Beach.

The accommodation comes with a TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries, while the kitchen features a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony.

Description: Golf aficionados can look forward to teeing off at one of the nearby golf courses, where the rolling hills and beautiful vistas of Istria create a memorable golfing experience. Meanwhile, history buffs will appreciate the home's proximity to Pula, a city rich in Roman architecture, including the well-preserved Amphitheater. The coastal towns of Rovinj and Porec, 27 km and 47 km away respectively, offer hiking enthusiasts picturesque trails along the Adriatic coast, where the blend of natural beauty and historical sites forms a hiker's paradise.

At the guest house, every room is equipped with a terrace. At Centrum Sleepover each room is fitted with a shared bathroom and bed linen.

Description:
The Pyramid Lofts, set in the heart of Cairo and merely 600 meters away from the awe-inspiring Great Sphinx, offers guests an exceptional stay with a blend of modern amenities and proximity to ancient wonders. Located within 4.3 km of the majestic Giza Pyramids, this accommodation provides a unique opportunity to explore one of the world's most historic regions, all while enjoying the comforts of home with free WiFi and air conditioning.

Guests at The Pyramid Lofts are welcomed into a communal setting with access to a shared lounge and terrace, perfect for socializing or simply relaxing after a day of exploration. The lofts also feature a shared kitchen, allowing guests to prepare their own meals and feel at home. Towels and bed linen are conveniently provided in the apartment, ensuring a comfortable stay.

For those looking to explore the area on two wheels, a bicycle rental service is available right at the apartment. Cycling enthusiasts will find the nearby areas ripe for adventure, offering a unique perspective of Cairo's landscapes and historical sites.

Beyond the proximity to the Great Sphinx and Giza Pyramids, The Pyramid Lofts is also located 14 km from notable landmarks such as Cairo Tower, the Mosque of Ibn Tulun, and The Egyptian Museum, making it an ideal base for guests keen on exploring Cairo's rich cultural tapestry. Cairo International Airport is 30 km away, with the property offering a paid airport shuttle service for convenient travel arrangements.

Guests are kindly requested to inform The Pyramid Lofts of their expected arrival time in advance to ensure a seamless check-in process. It is important to note that the property maintains a peaceful environment and does not accommodate hen, stag, or similar parties.

Managed by a private host, The Pyramid Lofts promises a personalized and memorable stay in Cairo, combining the excitement of exploration with the comfort and convenience of modern living. Whether you're here to delve into the mysteries of ancient Egypt or to experience the vibrant life of Cairo, The Pyramid Lofts offers the perfect backdrop for your adventure.

Description:

If you would like to discover the area, hiking and cycling are possible in the surroundings.

Description:
This holiday home is quietly located in the Baltic Sea resort of Zinnowitz, 500 metres from the beach. Mondfisch an der Ostsee offers a covered terrace leading to a garden with barbecue facilities.

The non-smoking interiors consist of 2 bedrooms, a small bathroom and a living room with a kitchenette and dining area. There is also an HD cable TV as well as a cot and high chair for children.

The holiday home is set in spacious grounds and surrounded by pine trees. Many restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

Ferienwohnung Mondfisch an der Ostsee is just 40 metres from a childrens playground. It is a 7-minute walk from the Bernsteintherme Thermal Baths and the Baltic Sea Promenade

A parking space is provided for guests.  Zinnowitz Train Station is 1 km away. A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note you will be asked to pay a returnable deposit of EUR 50 in cash when checking in.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Located in Waidhaus, near the Czech border, Ferienwohnung Zetzl is a holiday home offering a large garden with seating. Guests have use of free Wi-Fi during their stay. Kings Casino in Rozvadov is only 9 km away.

Each apartment features a dining room and a living room with a flat screen cable TV. Bathrooms have a bathtub, shower and a hairdryer. There is a washing machine and a tumble dryer.

Guests can prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen which includes a coffee machine, a dishwasher and a microwave. Barbecue facilities are also offered at the property.

Guests can go hiking in the area or cycling on the nearby Bockl-Radweg bike path. The Bckerd water park is only a 5-minute drive from the property. Please inform Ferienwohnung Zetzl in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.

Just 50 metres from the beach of Agios Gordios in Corfu, Nikis Apartments features air-conditioned studios with free Wi-Fi and balcony.

A kitchenette with cooking facilities, dining area and fridge is included in all units at the Nikis Apartments. Each has a private bathroom with shower.

Taverns, bars and shops are within a 3-minute walk. Corfu International Airport is 15 km away. Please inform Nikis Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Located in Le Gosier, 1.5 km from Datcha Beach, Le Belleplaine provides accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities and an outdoor pool.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.

The holiday home offers a childrens playground.

Description:
Nestled in the serene landscape of Shahpur, Hotel Heaven offers a tranquil retreat with accommodations that boast private terraces, providing guests with an intimate space to relax and enjoy the natural beauty surrounding them. The hotel prides itself on its hospitality, featuring a 24-hour front desk ready to cater to guests' needs at any hour.

Each unit at Hotel Heaven is thoughtfully equipped with a flat-screen TV, ensuring that guests have access to entertainment and leisure within the comfort of their rooms. The private bathrooms add an extra layer of privacy and convenience, making each stay comfortable and hassle-free.

Guests can start their day on a refreshing note with a vegetarian breakfast served every morning at the property. This wholesome beginning ensures that guests are well-nourished and prepared for the day ahead, whether it involves exploring the local area or simply relaxing at the hotel.

Located 50 km from Chandigarh Airport, Hotel Heaven is conveniently accessible for travelers flying in or out. The distance offers a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle while still being close enough for ease of travel.

Hotel Heaven is an ideal choice for those seeking a peaceful stay in Shahpur, with its blend of modern amenities, attentive service, and a serene environment. Whether you're in the area for leisure or looking for a quiet getaway, Hotel Heaven promises a restful and rejuvenating experience.
HotelFacilities: Room service 24-hour front desk Terrace Non-smoking rooms Airport shuttle Family rooms Internet access Free WiFi Free WiFi Air conditioning

Reviews: This is one of those very special hotels that makes you feel so at home so comfortable and well taken care of that you actually think about planning another visit to the city just so you can stay here again Although they have just 18 rooms this hotel doesn t feel cramped or small the high ceilings and huge windows make it seem like a much larger space yet with a sense of calm and intimacy that will sooth any weary traveller They even have a small rooftop pool don t expect much it s tiny but hey you re in the city in an historic building a bar at the top with gorgeous views and a Spa with massage and facial services The hotel is located in an old historic building and rooms have beautiful hardwood floors and the original ceiling beams and details But the hotel is just four years old so everything was refurbished and renovated and very clean and luxurious The bathrooms are wonderful double sinks great lighting a detail so important and yet so often overlooked in hotels a full bathtub AND a full separate shower stall commode with its own full door so more than one person can use the bathroom at the same time Molton Brown toiletries huge thick and soft monogrammed towels and a heated towel rack In the room the beds are terrific and they even have a pillow menu so you can choose the sort of pillow you want and a room scent menu as well Drinks in the minibar are all complimentary so you can refresh yourself without spending a fortune And a sign of the exceptional service was shown when I left the room and came back in the evening to find that the exact same drinks I had consumed that afternoon has been restocked The hotel has an excellent location right off the Las Ramblas pedestrian mall and just steps away and overlooking the beautiful and popular Pla a Reial I just wish that more hotels would be like the Do and offer such fantastic facilities and service  |  Good location very near Centrale Station but is far away enough from the crowd Breakfast is the basic one Staff is efficient and professional Tidy and clean  |  layout facilities and amazingly happy helpful staff Great bar with relaxed lounge style seating on 7th floor stunning views from the balcony  |  Air conditioning excellent comfortable bed reasonable space  |  We stayed over the Christmas holiday so this may have made our experience a bit different than most reviewers We were greeted with a warm welcome and our stay was comfortable and cozy A great location right on a tram line and U bahn station and a relatively quiet and less crowded area Standard breakfast fare good for the price  |  when we arrived we were met with a big smile and a very friendly welcome our room was out of this world very plush and very large beautiful decoration every comfort you could wish for the bathroom was well appointed with two towel bathrobes which were very handy the bed was a dream on which to dream on the staff were more than helpful and were only too willing to help book tickets for shows and for sight seeing trips which we loved the area in which the hotel was situated was lovely and there was a bus stop right outside which took you right into Piccadilly which we used more than once getting a wonderful tour of London all they way there is also a tube station right round the corner which is very handy for anyone planning a trip to London i would highly recommend this hotel it is a little bit outside the center but London has so many centers but its value comfort and excellent staff make it a very worthwhile choice and really your only around ten minutes by tube from anywhere you want to go GO AHEAD TRY IT YOU WILL NOT BE DISSAPOINTED

Description:
Offering a restaurant and free bikes, Hotel Petite Fleur is located in Alba Adriatica, right opposite the sea. This hotel features free parking and classically furnished rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Petite Fleur Hotels rooms are decorated with light colour schemes, and include air conditioning and a private bathroom with hairdryer and shower.

At the hotel you can enjoy a drink from the bar, or simply relax on the shared terrace with parasols and design sofas. Free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Alba Adriatica Train Station is 2 km from the property. Please inform Hotel Petite Fleur in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Located in Castelrotto, near Marinzenlift, Alpin Boutique Villa Gabriela is a country house featuring a garden. Free private parking is available on site.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some units also feature a spa bath or private sauna.

A gluten-free or continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area. Meals can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant, drinks are available at the bar.

Alpi Boutique Villa Gabriela also features a wellness area with a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath and relaxation area. Please inform Alpin Boutique Villa Gabriela in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.

Description:
Offering free breakfast every morning, Lungomare Hotel is located in Marina Di Cecina. The closest beach is 10 metres away.

With free Wi-Fi, the rooms are simply but tastefully furnished and include a flat-screen TV, desk, and safe. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can choose either an outdoor or indoor seating area for breakfast.

Within 8 km of Lungomare Hotel, guests can enjoy the white, sandy beaches of Vada. In addition, Cecina Train Station is 2 km away and has links to nearby cities like Pisa and Grosseto.

Hiking is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the bed and breakfast. Property provides Rooftop Terrace with 360 degrees view of Northern Coastline and Mountains.

Ocho Rios is 24 km from Baileys Bed and Breakfast, while Green Grotto Caves are 6,5 km away. The nearest airport is Montego Bay Airport, 62 km from the property. Address: Homa Bay-Kendu Bay Road Homa Bay 40300
Description:
Set in Homa Bay, 37 km from Ruma National Park, The Golden Rays Resort offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Every room is equipped with a balcony with a lake view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Golden Rays Resort every room has bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

The nearest airport is Kisumu International Airport, 108 km from The Golden Rays Resort.

Reviews: My stay in BARCELONA exceeded all of my expectations from start to finish The Hotel was excellent especially as it was so centrally located and wonderfully designed Almost everywhere could be reached on foot The Hotel Staff were extremely obliging as nothing was too much trouble for them and they provided lots of information regarding the places of interest in the City I would certainly recommend using the City Tour Buses as they provide good value for money The one ticket can be used on both routes being east and west therefore taking in many many sights that could not be reached on foot As a tip to Tourists use the blue Autobus service to and from the Airport and buy a return ticket as it is just over 10 euros per person and the travelling time is only 20 minutes approximately Why waste money on taxis when you could be spending it on all that wonderful cuisine  |  Nice hotel good bed excellent shower free minibar |  Great location lovely staff nice small room |  Location staff and facilities  |  The breakfast was lovely with freshly made pastries Location was good |  Location is ideal to start a visit in the old city center |  Clean room comfy bed toiletries provided Supermarkets nearby  |  Great location and yummy breakfast  |  The location is fantastic and the view couldn t be better The room was just to our needs This hotel shows great value for money  |  Good location and easy access to sites and Metro Price by Paris standards was good

Address: Baobab Ii Opp. Neptun Sentido Hotel
Description:
Set in Diani Beach, Villa Soleil offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, free bikes and access to a garden with an outdoor pool. Located 2.7 km from Colobus Conservation, the property provides a fitness centre and free private parking.

The holiday home features 5 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 5 bathrooms with a shower.

The holiday home offers a continental or  la carte breakfast.

Villa Soleil offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub and terrace. A barbecue and water sports facilities can be found at the accommodation, along with a shared lounge.

Kaya Kinondo Sacred Forest is 4.3 km from Villa Soleil, while Baharini Shopping Centre is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Ukunda, 7 km from the holiday home, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Villa Soleil in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Medical monitoring is available for guests quarantined due to Coronavirus (COVID-19). This may be provided in person or virtually, depending on the property type and location.
A damage deposit of USD 250 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by bank transfer. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via bank transfer, subject to an inspection of the property.

Address: 5A Kg Tanjung Mali Manchee Village Kedawang Langkawi
Description:
Holiday Home Sunshine Cenang is a beachfront property located in Pantai Cenang, 1.4 km from Pantai Tengah Beach and less than 1 km from Underwater World Langkawi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 200 metres from Cenang Beach, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The holiday home is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views.

After a day of hiking or snorkelling, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Laman Padi Langkawi is 1 km from the holiday home, while Mahsuri International Exhibition Centre is 8.6 km away. The nearest airport is Langkawi International, 5 km from Holiday Home Sunshine Cenang, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. Please inform Holiday Home Sunshine Cenang in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of MYR 500 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
From 1st January 2023, a tourist tax of RM 10 per room per night is applied to all foreign guests. This tax is not included in the room rate and must be paid upon check-in. Guests with a valid Malaysian Identity Card or valid permanent residents MY PR Card are exempted. Please note: Electricity will be charged based on usage.
Beginning 1 July 2016, as directed by the Langkawi Municipal Council, a local government Tourism Promotion Fee would be applicable per room per night.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Featuring city views, Noahs Homestay provides accommodation with a restaurant and a balcony, around 18 km from Evolve Concept Mall. The air-conditioned accommodation is 8.5 km from Royal Gallery Selangor, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Around-the-clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Malay.

Mid Valley Megamall is 25 km from the apartment, while Thean Hou Temple is 27 km away. The nearest airport is Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport, 14 km from Noahs Homestay. Please inform Noahs Homestay in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
From 1st January 2023, a tourist tax of RM 10 per room per night is applied to all foreign guests. This tax is not included in the room rate and must be paid upon check-in. Guests with a valid Malaysian Identity Card or valid permanent residents MY PR Card are exempted.

Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, and a shared lounge, Villa Angelou - Sunlit Beach Getaway with Pool and WIFI provides accommodation in Belle Mare with free WiFi and sea views. This villa features free private parking and a shared kitchen.

The villa comes with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

The villa offers a hot tub. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Villa Angelou - Sunlit Beach Getaway with Pool and WIFI.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Belle Mare Beach, Solana Beach and Long Beach. The nearest airport is Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam, 46 km from Villa Angelou - Sunlit Beach Getaway with Pool and WIFI, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Villa Angelou - Sunlit Beach Getaway with Pool and WIFI in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description: Set in a prime location of Mauritius Island, Oasis Villas by Evaco Holiday Resorts puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out, kitchen. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, private pool, whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including private beach, sauna, spa, massage, pool (kids). Oasis Villas by Evaco Holiday Resorts is an excellent choice from which to explore Mauritius Island or to simply relax and rejuvenate.

Description:
Boasting a garden, a shared lounge as well as a terrace, Casa del Parque Vallarta is situated in the centre of Puerto Vallarta, 300 metres from Camarones Beach. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room is fitted with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views.

Los Muertos Beach is 2 km from Casa del Parque Vallarta, while Amapas Beach is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Just a 5-minute walk from central Uruapan, Hotel Sarabia offers free private parking, free Wi-Fi and functional rooms with flat-screen cable TV. St Francisco de Asis Church is 800 metres away.

Rooms at the Hotel Sarabia have simple modern dcor with touches of bold colour. All rooms offer a private bathroom and views of the street or city. Some rooms also have a balcony.

Various restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of Hotel Sarabia, while Uruapan Train Station is an 8-minute walk away. Lic. Eduardo Ruiz National Park and Uruapan Airport are within a 10-minute drive.

Description:
Bouad Luxury Apartment offers accommodation in Taghazout, 19 km from Agadir.

There is a dining area and a kitchen as well as a private bathroom. Other facilities at Bouad Luxury Apartment include a barbecue.

Car hire is available at the property and the area is popular for horse riding. Al Massira Airport is 37 km from the property.

Description:
Hotel Torenzicht is located in the Red Light District, a 5-minute walk from Dam Square. There is a 24-hour bar where you can watch sports on a big screen.

The non-smoking rooms have a washbasin with hot and cold running water. The shared bathrooms are situated in the hallway. The hotel is located in a typical historic, monumental building and features steep stairs.

Each morning, a continental breakfast is available and you can make use of free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas of Hotel Torenzicht.

The surrounding area has a variety of cafeterias, restaurants and bars. Amsterdam Central Station is a 10-minute walk away and offers a direct connection to Schiphol Airport in 15 minutes. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Restaurant is closed from Sat 13 Jun 2020 until Fri 31 Jul 2020
Please note that Hotel Torenzicht is housed in a medieval monumental building with no lift and steep stairs.

Please note that children cannot be accommodated at the hotel.

Description:
Set in De Heidetuin, Boutique B&B Villa Heidetuin is located in Bergen op Zoom. Free WiFi access is available. The property provides a large garden and spacious terrace with outdoor furniture.

Elegantly furnished, each room here will provide you with a TV and a seating area. There is also a microwave in the common area. In the private bathroom you will find a shower, bathrobes and free toiletries. Extras include bed linen and ironing facilities.

A rich breakfast is served daily with several options, including vegetarian and gluten-free products.

Boutique B&B Villa Heidetuin also offers meeting facilities, luggage storage and dry cleaning.The surrounding area is covered with parks and forests and is perfect for cycling. The property offers free parking.

The bed and breakfast is 1.8 km from Bergen op Zoom Station. Antwerp is 39 km from this bed and breakfast. Rotterdam The Hague Airport is 53 km away. Please inform Boutique B&B Villa Heidetuin in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Please note that group dinners are available on request.

Please note that if guests would like to eat glutenfree, they have to mention this to the property in advance.

Please note that checking-in is possible until 20:00 hrs. Checking-in between 20:00 and 22:00 hrs is only possible upon request and after 22:00 only against a surcharge of EUR 15.

Description:
Te Mata B & B is set in Havelock North, 1.5 km from Black Barn Vineyards, around 1.8 km from Te Mata Estate and 3.6 km from Craggy Range Vineyards.

The rooms are spacious and warm in the winter. In the summer months guests enjoy the salt water outdoor pool. Breakfast is included in the price.

Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodation. There are fantastic cycle trails through vineyards and along the Tukituki River. You can also enjoy bush alks, weekend markets and great restaurants.

Hawkes Bay Airport is 22 km from the property. Please inform Te Mata B & B in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Lagos, 1.8 km from Nike Art Gallery, EXECUTIVE HOME offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Situated conveniently in the Lekki Phase 1 district, this hotel features a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room has a kettle, while some have a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

A Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at EXECUTIVE HOME.

Ikoyi Golf Course is 7.5 km from the accommodation, while Red Door Gallery is 8.2 km away. The nearest airport is Murtala Muhammed International Airport, 27 km from EXECUTIVE HOME.

Description: Bardla Hyfjellshotell is a popular choice amongst travelers in Geilo, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, room service, meeting facilities are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like heating, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace, telephone. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, skiing, fishing, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Geilo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Bardla Hyfjellshotell.

Description:
Featuring free WiFi access, a restaurant, a bar and located only a 2-minute walk from Playa Norte Beach, Casa Barco Punta Hermosa offers accommodations in Punta Hermosa. An American buffet breakfast is available for an extra fee.

The well-decorated rooms are all fitted with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The suite is additionally equipped with a private sauna.

At Casa Barco Punta Hermosa guests will find a magnificent outdoor pool, massage services, a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk, a garden and a terrace. The property is equipped with a meeting room capable of holding up to 25 people.

The hotel is located 11.6 km from Pachacmac Archeological Sanctuary. Jorge Chavez International Airport is 46 km away; shuttle service can be arranged for an extra fee. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.
The hotel kindly asks guests to send their ID or Passport information after having made their reservations.

Based on local tax laws, Peruvian citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Peru) must pay an additional fee of 18% .To be exempt from this 18% additional fee (IVA), a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented.

Please note both documents are required for fee exemption. Guests who are not able to present both documents will be required to pay the fee.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 18% regardless of the length of their stay in Peru. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Situated in Smyczyna, 48 km from Wielkopolska National Park, Hotel Ranczo Smyczyna features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Ranczo Smyczyna.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel.

The nearest airport is Poznan-Lawica Henryk Wieniawski Airport, 72 km from Hotel Ranczo Smyczyna. Please inform Hotel Ranczo Smyczyna in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.

Description:
Located in the Algarvian countryside, Belo Horizonte offers air-conditioned rooms featuring a balcony with views of the garden or pool. There are BBQ facilities and a lounge area equipped with a large flat-screen TV.

Each modern room has a TV and a fridge. The private bathroom has a shower and wash basin.

Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast daily which is served in the dining room. Several cafs and restaurants serving international and southern Portuguese-style cuisine are located in Praia da Luz, which is a 10-minute drive away.

The Horizonte has a swimming pool and billiards in the lounge. Guests can go to the Burgau Beach which is a 10-minute drive away. Free WiFi is available in the public areas of the Belo Horizonte.

Faro city centre and Faro International Airport are both within a 1-hour drive away. Free private parking is available on site. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that guests booking Non-Refundable Rates should inform Belo Horizonte of their invoicing details (Name, Address and VAT number) at the time of booking.

Please note that the air conditioning in the rooms has an extra fee of EUR 2 per day.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Boasting a garden, an outdoor pool and sea views, Apartment Peniche swimming pool is set in Peniche de Cima. Featuring free private parking, the holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, fishing and cycling.

The holiday home features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet.

The holiday home offers a terrace, a childrens playground and a barbecue.

Popular points of interest near Apartment Peniche swimming pool include Praia do Portinho da Areia do Norte, Praia do Quebrado and Gamboa Beach. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado, 93 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. A damage deposit of EUR 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Hotel Coandi is situated on the cliff of Mures River. A bar and a restaurant serving Romanian and Mediterranean specialties are situated on site.

Rooms and suites at the Coandi are all air-conditioned and feature a TV, a minibar and a work desk. Private bathrooms provide a shower, while some are equipped with a spa bath.

The hotel offers a spacious summer terrace, as well as a sauna, massage facilities and a tennis court. The lobby provides a sofa and armchairs. A fully equipped conference hall is also at guests disposal.

The centre of Arad can be reached in 2 km, while the historical Citadel of Arad is 1 km away. Neptun Public Pool is 1 km away and the Gloria Stadium is within walking distance.

Arad Airport is 3 km from the Coandi, as is the Arad Central Railway Station. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
This tranquil farm is located in the Summerpride suburb of East London which lies within the Eastern Cape Province of South Africa. Santa Paloma Guest Farm offers a variety of accommodation types and has a restaurant, bar and library.

The rooms feature African dcor comprising of natural colours. Some rooms offer a private entrance and bathroom, whilst some have access to shared bathroom facilities. Free WiFi is available in public areas and guests can relax in the shared lounge.

Santa Paloma Guest Farm serves breakfast at a charge in the restaurant. BBQ facilities are also available on site. The hostel features lush surroundings and guests can relax by the poolside.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including horse riding, hiking, ping-pong and darts. The East London Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hostel. Please inform Santa Paloma Guest Farm in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Located in Alameda, 45 minutes from Malaga and one hour from Cordoba, the country house is set in a quiet atmosphere surrounded by nature.

The charming rural country house has been renovated and has wedding halls, a restaurant and Internet access. There are a total of 21 rooms on offer.

The rooms are predominantly decorated with wood and are luminous and quiet. They have en suite bathrooms with bathtub and hairdryer, as well as a telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access and individually regulated air conditioning and heating. Furthermore, they are equipped with a double bed, radio, hifi, safe and minibar.

The establishment offers guests use of an outdoor swimming pool, as well as table tennis and pool/snooker facilities.

Description:
Enjoy the atmosphere of a typical Skne farmhouse from 1850. This intimate B&B provides free WiFi and private parking close to beautiful beaches, nature reserves and the ferries to Denmark.

Just 9 kilometres from the village of Klippan, Mattisgrden Bed & Breakfast offers elegant yet cosy room and apartment options. Some rooms and apartments have their own kitchen facilities, while other rooms include access to a communal kitchen. In addition, Mattisgrden provides communal laundry and drying facilities.

Mattisgrden has several comfortable public areas, including a snug TV room. Unwind in the hotel sauna. Enjoy a relaxing bath in the wood-heated hot tub. A continental breakfast is served daily.

After exploring the surroundings, treat yourself to a home-cooked meal at Mattisgrden. Dinner has to be ordered at least 3 days in advance. If the weather allows, guests can enjoy their food in the terrace outside.

Prepare your own delicious meal by using the barbecue equipment in the terrace.

Mattisgrden uses an environmentally friendly heating system. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Mattisgrden Bed & Breakfast in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Please note that dinner must be booked at least 3 days in advance.

If you expect to arrive outside check-in hours, please inform Mattisgrden Bed & Breakfast in advance.

If you expect to arrive outside check-in hours, please note that Mattisgrden Bed & Breakfast charges up to SEK 300 for late check-in.

Please note that breakfast is served 07:30-08:30 during weekdays, and 08:30-09:30 during weekends. For a surcharge, guests can book an earlier or later breakfast. Contact the property for more information.

Description:
The perfect accommodation when traveling to Slen or Vemdalen/re. Just 2 hours to Slen: eat your breakfast, continue your journey and enjoy a full day of skiing before checking in to your cabin.

Close to Sfsen Resort. And an ideal location visiting the Vansbro Swim or Rally Sweden.

Price includes breakfast, made up bed and towels.

There is free wifi internet and living room with TV. I you bring an infant we can arrange a highchair and cot. In the kitchen there is a coffe maker, microwave and stove. Set in natural surroundings, this B&B is located by Route 26 in Swedens Dalarna region. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a wardrobe.

All rooms at Route 26 have access to shared shower facilities. 2 rooms have a private toilet. All rooms have a seating area.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Route 26 B&B. Canoes are available for rent on site.

Filipstad town centre is 50 minutes drive from Route 26.  The ski resorts of Slen are within 2 hours drive. Please inform Route 26 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that the Wi-Fi internet connection is down between 00:00 and 06:00.

Description:
With Sahara Centre reachable in 16 km, Millennium Place Mirdif Apartments features accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a shared lounge. Free WiFi is available.

Each unit has a balcony, a satellite flat-screen TV, a seating area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options.

Free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk.

A terrace is available for guests to use at the aparthotel.

Grand Mosque is 18 km from Millennium Place Mirdif Apartments, while Dubai World Trade Centre is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dubai International, 9 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. A damage deposit of AED 500 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Sunnyside Lodge is located in Cwmbach. The accommodation is 49 km from Newport.

The holiday home features 1 bedroom, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy golfing and cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Cardiff is 35 km from Sunnyside Lodge, while Swansea is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Cardiff Airport, 53 km from the accommodation. Description:
Cameron House Two bedroom Detached Lodge L45 offers accommodation in Balloch, 6 km from Balloch Castle Country Park. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi.

This holiday home is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms. Important update: The Spa, The Carrick Golf Course, The Wee Demon Golf Course, The Boat House Bar & Restaurant and The Claret Jug Bar & Restaurant are open as normal. However, the main hotel and its facilities, including the Leisure Club, are currently closed. Cameron Lodges guests are able to use the leisure facilities at the Spa which is located at the Carrick estate and also the Meadow Leisure Centre in Dumbarton. A shuttle service runs frequently between Cameron House and The Carrick Estate. Please note that the lodges at Cameron House temporarily have no Wi-Fi but we are working hard to rectify this. The Cameron Club lodges have full Wi-Fi. For more information regarding any of the above, please email

Description:
Situated in Arundel, 15 km from Bognor Regis Train Station, Arden House features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 19 km from Goodwood House, 20 km from Chichester Train Station and 20 km from Goodwood Racecourse. The property is non-smoking and is set 18 km from Goodwood Motor Circuit.

At the guest house, all rooms have a wardrobe. Arden House offers some rooms with garden views, and each room is fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Arden House.

Chichester Cathedral is 21 km from the guest house, while Chichester Harbour is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is London Gatwick Airport, 56 km from Arden House. Please inform Arden House in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Glen View, nestled in the picturesque Cannich in the Highlands region, presents a luxurious 4-star holiday home experience amidst Scotland's breathtaking landscapes. This property, boasting free WiFi and situated 36 km from Invergarry, offers a serene getaway with all the comforts of home.

The holiday home features 4 cozy bedrooms, accommodating a range of group sizes, from families to small gatherings of friends. Guests will find a well-equipped kitchen at their disposal, complete with a dishwasher and microwave for convenience, as well as a washing machine, ensuring all the comforts and needs of home are met during their stay. The home is complemented by 5 bathrooms, providing ample facilities for guests, each with a bath or shower.

Outdoor enthusiasts will be delighted with the property's garden, featuring a barbecue area perfect for social gatherings or peaceful evenings under the stars. The location is ideal for cycling enthusiasts, with nearby trails offering a unique way to explore the stunning surroundings.

Glen View is conveniently located 37 km from Inverness, making it a great base for exploring the city's attractions. Strathpeffer is just 25 km away, offering additional local charm and history to discover. For guests traveling by air, Inverness Airport is the nearest, located 43 km from the property, facilitating easy access for international and domestic visitors.

Guests are kindly reminded to provide photo identification and a credit card upon check-in. It's important to note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and may carry additional charges. The check-in and key-collection process is streamlined for convenience, although the specific details will be provided by the property.

Please note, Glen View maintains a peaceful atmosphere and does not accommodate hen, stag, or similar parties. Pet lovers will be pleased to know that one well-behaved dog is welcome, making it an ideal choice for those wishing to travel with their furry companion.

Glen View promises a blend of comfort, luxury, and adventure, offering an unforgettable stay in the Highlands for those seeking to immerse themselves in Scotland's natural beauty and tranquility.

Set in Bideford in the Devon region, Willets Cottage is a 3-star property featuring free WiFi. The holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as fishing and cycling.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Royal North Devon Golf Club is 3.1 km from the holiday home, while Westward Ho! is 5.8 km away. The nearest airport is Exeter International Airport, 99 km from Willets Cottage. Description:
Morrisy House, nestled in Blackpool's lively South Shore area, offers guests a cozy retreat within walking distance to some of the town's most exciting attractions. Situated just a 10-minute walk from the thrill-filled Blackpool Pleasure Beach and the vibrant Grosvenor G Casino Blackpool, this guesthouse is perfectly positioned for those looking to experience the best of Blackpool's entertainment offerings. Additionally, it is conveniently located 1.1 mi (1.7 km) from Blackpool Central Pier and 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from the iconic Blackpool Tower, making it an ideal base for exploring the local sights.

The guesthouse features 13 well-appointed guestrooms, each equipped with complimentary wireless Internet access to ensure guests stay connected during their visit. Private bathrooms with showers come stocked with complimentary toiletries and hair dryers, providing a comfortable and convenient stay. In-room conveniences such as coffee/tea makers add a touch of home, and irons/ironing boards are available upon request.

Guests can wrap up their day with a relaxing drink at the bar/lounge, offering a cozy atmosphere to unwind. For those who prefer starting their day with a hearty meal, full breakfasts are served daily from 8:30 AM to 9:00 AM for a fee, ensuring guests are well-fueled for their adventures ahead.

Check-in instructions highlight the guesthouse's policies, including potential extra-person charges and the requirement for government-issued photo identification and a form of deposit at check-in for incidental charges. Special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges, emphasizing the guesthouse's commitment to accommodating guests' needs. The property accepts credit cards for convenience, and safety is prioritized with the inclusion of smoke detectors on the premises.

Morrisy House offers an inviting blend of comfort and accessibility, making it a wonderful choice for travelers seeking to immerse themselves in the vibrant life of Blackpool. Whether visiting for the amusement parks, the nightlife, or the scenic beauty of the coast, guests will find Morrisy House a welcoming base for their explorations.

Description:
Brynawel is located in Saint Dogmaels, 2.9 km from Poppit Sands Beach, 43 km from Oakwood Theme Park, as well as 43 km from Folly Farm. This holiday home provides free private parking, a shared lounge and free WiFi.

The holiday home comes with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with river views.

A sun terrace is available for guests to use at the holiday home.

Cardigan Castle is 2.2 km from Brynawel, while Cilgerran Castle is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cardiff Airport, 146 km from the accommodation. A damage deposit of GBP 150 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
