Description:
Nestled in the charming town of Cockermouth within the scenic Cumbria region, Applegarth offers a tranquil retreat for those looking to explore the beauty of Northern England. This holiday home is perfectly positioned in a peaceful setting, complete with a lovely garden and a private patio, providing guests with an idyllic outdoor space to relax and enjoy the natural surroundings.

Applegarth features three tastefully decorated bedrooms, ensuring a comfortable stay for families or small groups. The living space is equipped with a TV for entertainment, and the fully equipped kitchen offers everything guests might need, including a dishwasher, making meal preparation both easy and enjoyable.

Situated just 22 km from Keswick, this holiday home serves as an excellent base for exploring the Lake District, with its breathtaking landscapes, hiking trails, and outdoor activities. Carlisle is 41 km away, offering guests the opportunity to discover its rich history and cultural attractions.

Guests should note that the full amount of the reservation is required before arrival. Cottages.com will provide a confirmation with detailed payment information. Once the full payment is processed, guests will receive an email with the property's details, including the address and key collection instructions.

Applegarth maintains a peaceful atmosphere and does not accommodate hen, stag, or similar parties, ensuring a serene environment for all guests. Additionally, up to 2 pets are allowed upon request, making this holiday home a pet-friendly option for those who wish to travel with their furry friends.

With its inviting blend of comfort, convenience, and natural beauty, Applegarth promises a memorable stay in Cockermouth, offering an ideal getaway for those seeking to experience the enchanting Cumbria region and the wider Lake District area.

Description:
Tullich House B&B, located in Dufftown, offers a luxurious escape within a stone's throw of the renowned Glenfiddich Whisky Distillery and the Whisky Museum. This 4-star bed and breakfast, nestled in the heart of Scotland's whisky country, provides an intimate setting with just 2 guestrooms, each equipped with flat-screen televisions and complimentary wireless Internet access, ensuring a stay that's both comfortable and connected.

Guests can enjoy modern amenities in a traditional setting, where bathrooms are fitted with showers featuring rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. The thoughtful addition of free tea bags/instant coffee and complimentary bottled water in each room, along with daily housekeeping, adds to the comfortable and hospitable atmosphere Tullich House B&B is known for.

A complimentary full breakfast, served daily from 7:30 AM to 9 AM, offers a perfect start to a day of exploration. Whether venturing out to the nearby Cairngorms National Park, just 20.2 mi (32.5 km) away, for a day of hiking and enjoying the natural beauty of Scotland, or exploring the local area including the Macallan Distillery, located 6.8 mi (10.9 km) from the B&B, guests have a wealth of options at their doorstep.

For those interested in diving deeper into the rich whisky heritage of the region, Tullich House B&B's proximity to several distilleries offers unparalleled access to tours and tastings. Beyond whisky, the area is ripe for exploration, with opportunities for cycling through the picturesque Scottish countryside or enjoying leisurely walks in the serene surroundings.

The B&B provides a secure and welcoming environment, highlighted by safety features such as carbon monoxide detectors, fire extinguishers, smoke detectors, a security system, a first aid kit, and window guards. Guests planning to arrive after 7 PM are encouraged to contact the property in advance to ensure a smooth check-in process, as Tullich House B&B offers personalized service tailored to individual arrival times and needs.

With its blend of traditional charm, modern conveniences, and a prime location near some of Scotland's most celebrated distilleries, Tullich House B&B promises a memorable stay for whisky enthusiasts and nature lovers alike.

Description:
Located in Cheltenham, the London Inn is a welcoming establishment that places guests in the heart of this historic town, within a brief 5-minute drive of both the picturesque Cotswolds and Cheltenham General Hospital. This inn, known for its warm hospitality, is conveniently situated just 1.3 miles (2.1 km) from Cheltenham Town Hall and 2.6 miles (4.2 km) from the renowned Cheltenham Racecourse, making it an ideal base for visitors looking to explore the area's rich cultural heritage and natural beauty.

Guests can settle into one of the 8 cozy guestrooms, each designed to offer a comfortable and relaxing stay. The London Inn prides itself on creating a home-away-from-home atmosphere for its guests, ensuring a memorable and enjoyable visit.

Dining at the London Inn is a delight, with a restaurant on-site serving a variety of satisfying meals. In the evening, guests are invited to unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge, making for a perfect end to a day of exploration or business. Additionally, a complimentary breakfast is included with every stay, providing guests with a delicious start to their day.

For those planning to check in, it's noted that extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on the property's policy. Government-issued photo identification, along with a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit, may be required at check-in for incidental charges. While special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges, the inn's staff strives to accommodate guests' needs to ensure a pleasant stay. The property accepts both credit cards and cash for convenience.

Upon arrival, guests will be greeted by the friendly front desk staff, who are eager to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. The London Inn's combination of convenient location, comfortable accommodations, and friendly service makes it a great choice for travelers visiting Cheltenham, whether they're there to soak in the natural beauty of the Cotswolds, attend events at the Cheltenham Racecourse, or have appointments at the Cheltenham General Hospital.

Description:
In a prime location in Blackpool, Crossways Hotel is just 500 metres from the seafront and the popular Central Pier. The SeaLife Aquarium can be reached after a 10-minute walk and Blackpool Tower is less than 1 mile away.

Each modern room offers tea and coffee making facilities and a wardrobe or a closet. Some rooms benefit from a TV. All rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities.

There are numerous restaurants, fish and chip shops, and lively bars in the area surrounding the Crossways Hotel. The seaside towns central shops can be reached after a 20-minute walk.

With rollercoasters and other thrill rides, Blackpool Pleasure Beach is a 20-minute walk from the Crossways Hotel. The Sandcastle Waterpark can also be found within 1 mile.

The guest house is 500 metres from Central Pier, 800 metres from Coral Island and 1.1 km from Blackpool Winter Gardens. Manchester Airport is 71 km away. Please note that this is a family-oriented establishment and guests are kindly asked to be mindful of noise levels.

Guests aged 14 years or younger are considered children.

Childrens breakfast cost is GBP 3.00.

Description:
Royal Chambers, Liverpool is located in Liverpool City Centre and offers simple and functional rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi. The property is just a 10-minute walk or 5-minute taxi from Liverpool Lime Street Station and is 20 minutes by car/taxi from Liverpool John Lennon Airport. The Royal Liverpool Hospital is situated across the road from the accommodation.

Each room at Royal Chambers has access to shared bathroom facilities. Towels and linens are provided in the rooms, which also have tea and coffee making facilities.

The property is within walking distance of bars, restaurant and shops, which includes Liverpool One, St Johns Shopping Centre and Clayton Square Shopping Centre. The O2 Academy music venue is very close by on foot, while the Albert Dock and sightseeing tourist spots are only a mile away. Description:
The Globe Hotel Gateshead is a 8 bedroom hotel located in Gateshead. This 5-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and luggage storage space.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. There are shared bathroom facilities available. Certain rooms here will provide you with a DVD player. The units have a wardrobe.

A Continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

The Globe Hotel Gateshead offers a sun terrace. You can play darts at the accommodation.

Newcastle upon Tyne is 2.5 km from The Globe Hotel Gateshead, while Durham is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Newcastle International Airport, 12 km from the property. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Set in Onich in the Highlands region and Loch Linnhe reachable within 1.3 km, Allt Nan Ros Apartments fort william offers accommodation with free WiFi, BBQ facilities, a garden and free private parking.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, bath and free toiletries, while the kitchenette has a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A microwave, a stovetop and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

A terrace is available on site and both hiking and skiing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Glen Nevis is 19 km from Allt Nan Ros Apartments fort william, while Glenfinnan Station Museum is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Oban Airport, 43 km from the accommodation. Description:
This vacation home in Pembroke not only situates guests within a comfortable distance from historic landmarks and pristine beaches but also offers an exciting opportunity for surfing enthusiasts. Located 15.7 miles (25.2 km) from Tenby Beach, this property is an ideal base for those looking to catch some waves. Tenby Beach, known for its golden sands and clear waters, is a popular spot for both novice and experienced surfers alike. The beach's varied surf conditions make it suitable for all levels, offering a perfect blend of challenge and fun for anyone looking to surf in the area.

In addition to its proximity to Pembroke Castle and the beautiful Barafundle Bay, the vacation home's location near Tenby Beach means guests can easily enjoy a day of surfing and beach activities before returning to the comfort of their holiday retreat. Just 5.3 miles (8.6 km) away, Freshwater East Beach also provides a picturesque setting for a variety of water sports and leisure activities, further enhancing the appeal of this vacation home for outdoor enthusiasts.

Upon arrival, guests will find themselves comfortably settled in their vacation home, equipped with all the essentials for a relaxing stay. It's important for guests to be aware of the check-in requirements, including the necessity for government-issued photo identification and a form of deposit for incidental charges. While special requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges, the property aims to accommodate guests' preferences to ensure a memorable and enjoyable visit.

Whether you're drawn to the area by the historic allure of Pembroke Castle, the natural beauty of Barafundle Bay, or the surfing opportunities at Tenby Beach, this vacation home offers a strategic and cozy base from which to explore all that the Pembroke region has to offer. With easy access to some of the most beautiful beaches in the area, guests are in for an unforgettable stay filled with adventure, relaxation, and the serene beauty of Wales.

Description:
Rockwood House owners Robert and Jean have been welcoming visitors for the last 31 years. Each guest is able to come and go as they wish as they all receive a key set. Magnificent views as you wake up in the morning excite our visitors into exploring the wonderful countryside of the Dales. We are always willing to plan routes, give advice and even lend you walking boots and maps to help you on your way and our car parking is so easy. Set within the peaceful Yorkshire village of Embsay, Rockwood House has beautiful views of the moors and surrounding countryside. It offers light, airy rooms.

Each room at Rockwood features an en suite shower room or full bathroom, free Wi-Fi access, and tea/coffee-making facilities. There is also a TV and a hairdryer for guests.

Rockwood House is situated on the edge of the idyllic Yorkshire Dales, with numerous scenic walking trails leading from the village. The town of Skipton, with its independent shops and famous market, is just a 5-minute drive away. Please inform Rockwood House in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Please note that due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, a light breakfast tray is provided to each room instead of a fresh cooked breakfast as stated in the property description.

Description:
HotelDescription#This hotel offers an attractive and peaceful location in the small town Cricket St. Thomas, in Somerset, southwest England. The nearest large town is Chard, which is around 2km away, and offers various shopping and entertainment venues. Taunton is around 10 km from the hotel and Bristol is a 70-minute drive away.

This appealing hotel occupies a historical 19th century building and includes 215 rooms spread over 2 floors. An inviting reception area welcomes guests on the second floor of the hotel. Further amenities include a cosy caf, a dining room, shopping opportunities, a bar and a nightclub. The hotel is ideal for business guests since it offers a number of conference rooms. Room services are further facilities that can be taken advantage of for an added fee as well as bicycle rental. For guests arriving by car, there is car parking offered outside the hotel.

The rooms are modern and comfortable, including their own bathroom with a hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, central heating and a radio. Tea/coffee making facilities and carpeting are also included in the rooms as standard.

Sports enthusiasts may make use of the heated indoor pool. Use of the wide range of health treatments, like the sauna, the solarium, the steam baths and massage service, is also available. In addition, tennis, miniature golf and archery can also be played in the hotel grounds. The hotel provides an excellent starting point for base for organised hiking and cycling tours in the surrounding area. Cricket St. Thomas Wildlife Park is a worthwhile excursion. The nearest golf course is approximately 2 km away

Description:
Boasting garden views, Strule Cottage features accommodation with a balcony and a kettle, around 18 km from Raphoe Castle. The 4-star holiday home has river views and is 11 km from Beltany Stone Circle.

The holiday home features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Featuring free private parking, this 4-star holiday home also features free WiFi throughout the property.

The holiday home offers a childrens playground. Guests at Strule Cottage can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Oakfield Park is 18 km from the accommodation, while The Balor Theatre is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is City of Derry Airport, 40 km from Strule Cottage. Description:
Situated in Telluride in the Colorado region, Haven on South Oak has a balcony and mountain views. This property offers access to a terrace and free private parking.

The holiday home is located on the ground floor and features 4 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a fridge, an oven, a washing machine, a dishwasher and a microwave. Towels and bed linen are available in the holiday home.

The nearest airport is Telluride Regional Airport, 8 km from the holiday home. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Nestled in Woodinville, Hideaway Lodge B and B is an enchanting retreat set across 3.5 acres of meticulously maintained gardens and trails, making it an ideal haven for outdoor enthusiasts. With every room offering stunning views of the gardens through the windows, guests are immersed in the tranquility of nature from the comfort of their accommodations. These rooms are well-appointed with flat-screen TVs with cable channels, private bathrooms, and essential amenities to ensure a restful stay.

The bed and breakfast takes pride in serving a hot 2-course gourmet breakfast every morning, with gluten-free and vegetarian options readily available, ensuring a hearty start to the day for all guests, regardless of dietary restrictions. The carefully curated breakfast menu is designed to energize guests for a day full of adventure and exploration.

For those keen on trail running and mountain biking, Hideaway Lodge B and B's surrounding area offers a plethora of trails that cater to both beginners and experienced enthusiasts. The property's proximity to natural trails provides an easy escape to the outdoors, where guests can enjoy the serenity of Woodinville's landscapes while engaging in their favorite activities.

In addition to its natural allure, the lodge features a sun terrace deck and a covered porch, perfect spots for relaxation after a day of trail running or mountain biking. Situated just minutes from Woodinville's vibrant activities, guests have the unique opportunity to blend outdoor adventure with local experiences, including wine tasting, beer and cider sampling, and enjoying concerts.

Hideaway Lodge B and B is conveniently located 22 km from Seattle and 16 km from Belleville, making it a peaceful retreat that is still close enough for guests to explore the city's attractions. Upon arrival, guests are reminded to provide photo identification and a credit card, and to note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and may include additional charges.

Offering a blend of comfort, nature, and adventure, Hideaway Lodge B and B is the perfect getaway for guests looking to indulge in trail running, mountain biking, and the rich local culture of Woodinville.
